formElement.label: Resource Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the ElectricFlow resource with the WebLogic instance running.

formElement.label: Resource Hostname:
formElement.documentation: Hostname of a machine with WebLogic and ElectricFlow Agent running on it. Either Resource hostname (and port) or Resource Name should be specified.

formElement.label: Resource Port:
formElement.documentation: Port of ElectricFlow agent running on the machine. Default is 7800.

formElement.label: Oracle Home:
formElement.documentation: Installation path of the WebLogic server, e.g. /home/oracle. Either this parameter or WLST Path parameter must be specified.

formElement.label: WLST Path:
formElement.documentation: Path to wlst.sh utility. If not provided, the procedure will look for it in known locations. Either this parameter or Oracle Home parameter must be specified.

formElement.label: Weblogic Connection Hostname:
formElement.documentation: Hostname to connect to WebLogic instance. Localhost by default.

formElement.label: Weblogic Connection Protocol:
formElement.documentation: Protocol to connect to WebLogic instance. T3S by default.

formElement.label: WebLogic Credentials:
formElement.documentation: Username and password to connect to WebLogic server.

formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: If specified, will be used to create ElectricFlow environment.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: If specified, will be used to create ElectricFlow environment.

formElement.label: Application Project Name:
formElement.documentation: Project name to create Application based on discovered entities.

formElement.label: Object Names:
formElement.documentation:
Objects to be retrieved from the WL Server in name=type pairs, e.g. HelloWorld=Deployment
helloDatasource = Datasource
The list of supported object types:
Deployment
ManagedServer
Cluster
Datasource
JMSQueue
JMSTopic
JMSServer
ConnectionFactory
User
Group
For JMS Resource the name of the resource should be prefixed by JMS Module Name: helloJMSModule/helloQueue
